did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Office of the Director of Research records, 1939-1967.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State College of Agriculture.Office of the Director of Research.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, minutes, reports, and other papers relating to various departments in the College and at Cornell.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, minutes, reports, and other papers relating to various departments in the College and at Cornell, particularly regarding issues of funding, research, appointments, and projects, and relations with the United States Department of Agriculture. Directors include Carl E. F. Guterman, Charles E. Palm, and W. Keith Kennedy. Also includes records of the Sugar Beet project.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Agriculture.
